title: How to get a free install and review of my app - Quora

response.answer_text: To get installs and reviews for free the app should be already popular and trusted. You can post some articles on different platforms to advert your app, but it’s not the easiest way, moreover doesn’t work well. But if your app is new and you don’t have experience at ASO and other things connected with marketing, then the most easiest and the most efficient way will be to buy installs and reviews from real people. There bunch of websites that provide this service.

It’s a long way, but you can try. But need to remember that it’s shareware (in any case, it take your time): Content marketing (social media, blog, Quora 😏)PR (articles, speeches at conferences, etc)App Store Optimization (keywords, title, tests, etc).All methods will be better with ad :)
